name: libzim-binding
description: Example of compiling C++ to asm.js and Node.js addons

scripts.build:native: autogypi -r build && node-gyp -C build/native configure build && copyasm build/native dist
scripts.install: npm run download && (npm run build:native || echo Warning: problems with native build)
scripts.__prepublish: tsc && (npm run build:asmjs || echo Warning: problems with asm.js build)

author: Joseph Reeve
